body_html: I'm not sure what problem you are running into. In general in Tensorflow, it's always possible to retrieve the values of trainable_variables, then use tf.assign to load them in a different graph, for as long a you can match them up (typically by var name).
body_text: I'm not sure what problem you are running into. In general in Tensorflow, it's always possible to retrieve the values of trainable_variables, then use tf.assign to load them in a different graph, for as long a you can match them up (typically by var name).
body: I'm not sure what problem you are running into. In general in Tensorflow, it's always possible to retrieve the values of `trainable_variables`, then use `tf.assign` to load them in a different graph, for as long a you can match them up (typically by var name).
